CustomField.description:
IF( OR(APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c = null, APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c = ''),
IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__DisabledLaunchButton", "Launch Disabled"),
HYPERLINK("https://" & MID( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_320, FIND("://", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100)+3, FIND( ".com", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100 )-4) & "servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=" & APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c & "&eid=" & Id & "&ic=1" , IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__ComposerLaunchButton" , "Launch Composer"), "_blank" ) )
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c = null, APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c = ''),
IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__DisabledLaunchButton", "Launch Disabled"),
HYPERLINK("/apex/APXTConga4__SMComposer8Launcher?SampleRecordId=" & Id & "&WeblinkId=" & APXTConga4__Weblink_ID__c & "&SMRecordId=" & APXTConga4__Conga_Solution__r.Id & "&OrganizationId=" & $Organization.Id , IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__ComposerLaunchButton" , "Launch Composer"), "_blank" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this button to launch the Composer QuickMerge Solution. Only available when the Button ID field is populated.
CustomField.label: Launch
